column1: What does the tree says in autumn ? leaf me alone.
column3: A leaf is a flat, green structure attached to a plant, where photosynthesis occurs.
column4: The leaf changed color during the fall season.
column5: I turned the leaf of the book to read the next page.

column1: How does a barber avoid getting hair in his food? by giving her a brazilian wax first!
column3: Hair refers to the filamentous strands that grow from the skin of humans and animals.
column4: He has always kept his hair short.
column5: The floor was covered in hair after the haircut.

column1: Why did the man open a rooftop bar? he wanted to have drinks on the house.
column3: A house is a building for human habitation.
column4: They live in a beautiful house near the lake.
column5: That house has been in their family for generations.
